statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
DELETE FROM LidarSensors WHERE accuracy > 0.8 AND range < 1000;
DELETE FROM object_detection WHERE detection_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LidarSensors WHERE location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM LidarSensors WHERE accuracy > 0.9 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Cars WHERE year < 2010 AND make = 'Toyota';
DELETE FROM ObjectDetectionData WHERE detection_id IN (SELECT detection_id FROM DetectedObjects WHERE object_class = 'person');
